europeana:record.dc:title: The morphology of Epilohmannia zwarti spec. nov., an Oribatid mite from New Guinea
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Hammen, van der L.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Epilohmanniidae; morphology; mouthparts; New Guinea; Oribatida; Palpigradi
europeana:record.dc:description: A detailed description is given of a new species of the genus Epilohmannia Berlese (Oribatida) from New Guinea. The relationships of the species are discussed. The mouthparts, characterized by the fusion of the epimera of the segments of palp and leg I, are compared with those of the Palpigradi (in which group these epimera have also fused).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The morphology of Epilohmannia zwarti spec. nov., an Oribatid mite from New Guinea (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 60) (Issue 5)
